name: Organic Fertilizer
description: A natural fertilizer made from plant and animal matter to improve soil health.

name: Nitrogen Fertilizer
description: A fertilizer high in nitrogen, essential for promoting leafy plant growth.

name: Phosphorus Fertilizer
description: Rich in phosphorus, this fertilizer supports root and flower development.

name: Potassium Fertilizer
description: This fertilizer boosts plant immunity and fruit production.

name: Compost Fertilizer
description: A rich compost fertilizer that improves soil structure and nutrient content.

name: Slow Release Fertilizer
description: Fertilizer that slowly releases nutrients over time for continuous growth.

name: Fish Emulsion Fertilizer
description: A liquid fertilizer made from fish, providing essential nutrients for plants.

name: Bone Meal Fertilizer
description: High in calcium and phosphorus, this fertilizer strengthens plants and promotes flowering.

name: Liquid Fertilizer
description: Liquid fertilizer for quick nutrient absorption, ideal for hydroponics.

name: Worm Castings Fertilizer
description: A natural and organic fertilizer made from worm castings, perfect for enriching soil.
